ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 316
ygData.msgSnippet: I was able to sell the gloves back to the vendor for just over 38pp (119 cha) making the true cost per attempt only 3pp, assuming no failures.  I also sold a
ygData.messageBody:
I was able to sell the gloves back to the vendor for just over 38pp (119
cha) making the true cost per attempt only 3pp, assuming no failures. I
also sold a pair to a gnome for 60pp.

QdP
Gnomish Magi
Ilsik Haucil
Mith Marr Server

--- Gazamel Prime <gazamel@...> wrote: > 1 steel lined
gloves.....26pp
> 1 sprockets.............. 7pp
> 1 gears.................. 7pp
> 1 metal twine............ 1pp
> 1 firewater.............. 1gp
>
> Looks to be about 41 plat per attempt, which is a TON
> better than the 225 per attempt previously thought to
> be the lowest needed to increase in skill past 104.
> Too bad they trivialize at 122, I'm at 125, and I got
> there solely on Aqualungs and Rebreathers 8(
>
> /sigh, looks like all the new tinkers will get to
> advance to the low 120s for about 1/6 the cost that us
> veteran tinkers paid. I'm happy that they've closed
> the gap some, but I feel somewhat cheated in the deal.
>
>
>
